title: Goodwin/Gypsey Queen album back cover, Allen & Ginter Tins

posts.post_title: Goodwin/Gypsey Queen album back cover, Allen & Ginter Tins
posts.post_content:
Hello, I have a couple of card related items I'd like to sell. *Shipping is included in the asking price* I prefer paypal, info on payment or anything else just PM me. Thanks, GB

-Goodwin album page, color back cover and b/w inside back cover. Thicker cardboard stock, a couple paper loss spots on color side etc. $35 Sold
-Large A&G Imperial Cube Cut tin, nice color. $40 Sold
-Small A&G Imperial Cube Cut tin with tax label $35 Sold
